roleset.name: obstruct, hinder with painful constriction, painfully constricting
roleset.note: CRAMP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cramp' based on sentences in ectb2. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'hamper.' (from cramp.01-v predicate notes)
CRAMPY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from crampy.01-j)

role.descr: cramped with what, instrument if separate from arg 0

example.name: All Arguments, Idiomatic
example.text: In public, he cramped my style with his incessant impersonations of Simpson's characters.
example.arg: with his incessant impersonations of Simpson's characters

example.name: Pain
example.text: The runner's calf muscle cramped painfully after the race.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Can magnesium toxicity lead to cramping of the feet?
